summary: Harvey Lowmyer is identified as an alias of Eric Starvo Galt and John Willard, who is a suspect in the assassination of Martin Luther King, Jr. CIA cables were disseminated to multiple locations worldwide requesting assistance in locating him. The cables provide information about Galt, including his aliases and physical description.
significance: Harvey Lowmyer, as an alias of Eric Starvo Galt, is significant because Galt was a suspect in the assassination of Martin Luther King, Jr. The CIA was actively seeking information and assistance in locating him.
